system.armourTypes: Any non-primitive Armour that covers all locations, except power armour,
system.effect: Adds +10 to Wearer's Strength Characteristic, weight of armour doesn't count towards carrying capacity. Armour requires power supply that lasts 1d5 hours.

description.value: Adds +10 to Wearer's Strength Characteristic, weight of armour doesn't count towards carrying capacity. Armour requires power supply that lasts 1d5 hours.
